description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. All the fun of the smash hit 'Flappy Bird' but with avatars on your Xbox 360! Enjoy the new multiplayer mode and share your scores globally with the updated scoreboards!
